name: Dig Box, Dig!
description:
You're a box! Dig your way down to the bottom of the world, collecting gems along your way to level up and be able to enter each new layer. A journey awaits!

Tap, click, or use the arrow keys/WASD to move and dig, hold to keep moving.

Created by Criobite in 72 hours during Ludum Dare 48.
(programming, design, music & sfx)

Note: If the text looks weird, try refreshing! I'm looking into fixing the issue.
